body_html:
It would be nice if the person implementing this could then also add the to(Layout) overload to at::Tensor. There is already test code in test/cpp/api/tensor.cpp to test this, just needs to be uncommented once it works :)

Yes, but we probably don't want to expose that until both dense -> sparse and sparse -> dense are working; I don't know if the later is working right now, but that may be a separate issue.

body:
> It would be nice if the person implementing this could then also add the to(Layout) overload to at::Tensor. There is already test code in test/cpp/api/tensor.cpp to test this, just needs to be uncommented once it works :)

Yes, but we probably don't want to expose that until both dense -> sparse and sparse -> dense are working; I don't know if the later is working right now, but that may be a separate issue.
